conversations.body_text: Hi Olegs Hanins,  Your order was originally scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to transportation delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They have now arrived at the warehouse, and we are processing them for storage and arranging DHL express shipping. We will update you with the tracking number tomorrow.

i dont need base plate can you refund me for baseplate but leave pedals? i ordered with baseplate but I dont need it. Can you do it?

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Olegs Hanins,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Your order has already been shipped, and we are unable to make any changes.  Merry Christmas!
